metadata.title: CVE-2017-15010 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A ReDoS (regular expression denial of service) flaw was found in thetough-cookie module before 2.3.3 for Node.js. An attacker that is able tomake an HTTP request using a specially crafted cookie may cause theapplication to consume an excessive amount of CPU.

criterions.comment: node-tough-cookie package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
